Action.author: clempo
Action.body: Exactly, I said Iterable<TransactionActionInfo> TransactionEnvelopeInfo.getTransactionActionInfos() makes sense. The one that is broken is BlockInfo.getTransactionActionInfos()

Action.author: rickr
Action.body: getTransactionActionInfos is just a duplicate of getEnvelopeInfos probably a forgotten cut paste.

Action.author: clempo
Action.body: Indeed, so let's remove BlockInfo.getTransactionActionInfos() and its support classes.
